data.title: Great Girls' Night Out!
data.text: What a fun and interesting concept -- self-serve wine bar -- I love it!  The atmosphere is cozy, the bartender was helpful and attentive, and you're sure to find several choices to your match your taste and budget!  Great Happy Hour-- prices were terrific (4pm-7pm).  Small plate options available!

data.title: Perfect Night Out
data.text: Della Viti is a great alternative to a bar setting. If you are looking to have a night out with friends, but don't enjoy the bar scene, this is the place for you! The owner is extremely friendly and the atmosphere is perfect. The wine can be seen as expensive as you pay for either a taste, 1/2 glass, or full glass. I don't mind the price and love to go here. The best part is you can bring in your own food. I personally ordered food from the restaurant across the street and brought it in. Unique and awesome!

data.title: What a fun place to meet friends and try different small sips of wine!
data.text: Great place to meet friends. Love trying different small tastes of wine!  What a great place for date night or just friends

data.title: You will need a lot of money...
data.text:
Nice atmosphere and the attendant was bubbly and informative.   There is a large selection of domestic and imported wines as well as port but I found the pours to be very small for the money.... 
Perhaps I am a bit more frugal than some but I will most likely continue to get my own bottle for a small percentage of the price of a few glasses here and enjoy them at home.

I will say that the machines are unique and I have never seen such a set up before, so kudos to  them for trying this!

data.title: Friendly Atmosphere
data.text: Della Viti is a fun place to hang out with friends and taste different wines.  Seating is casual and inviting. When you get there, stop at the bar to show them your photo ID and add money to a vending card.  You will use the card to buy a "taste", half, or full serving of the self-serve wines.  The variety is amazing and a great way to try something new.  They sell cheese & cracker or fruit & chocolate platters OR you are welcome to bring in your own food.  Stop in during Happy Hour for the best prices!

data.title: Glad it was a groupon
data.text: Went here with a group of friends on a Saturday night. Wine was way over priced, many ran out during our "pours" and it took at least an hour for the self serve stations to be restocked. The bartender/hostess acted like we were an inconvenience to put it mildly. Won't be back.

data.title: And I don't even like wine...
data.text:
This is apparently a great place if you like wine.  You can get a glass, a taste... you decide.

I like going there for the atmosphere.  It is comfortable and quiet enough you can have a conversation with one other person.  You can also host a larger group.  The staff there are outstanding - great senses of humor and very helpful if you have questions.

They have beer and other options if you don't like wine.  

It's a really good place to hang out.

data.title: Fun and Relaxing
data.text:
This is my favorite wine bar!
It is a great place to meet with friends or just unwind and enjoy the atmosphere.  Nice selection of wines that you can get "just a taste" or a full glass.  Your choice!  It is also self serve with cute little machines at your beckon call.
Tasty cheese board is available to enhance your experience, along with a sweets plate that I did not get a chance to experience.
This is a must go!  I come to Ames once per year, and this is what I look forward to the most.
